div.ab:
بسم اللّه الــرّحمن الرّحيم
هذا ما اشترت سيب الدّار ابنت عليّ بن محمّد من بهار بهار بن سليمن و بن عليّ و ابنت وحبّ الدّر ابنت أحمد بن نوح
اشترت منهم أجمعيــن جميع المنزل ـر المعروف بعيسى بن منخل ويحــيط بهذا المنــزل
ويشتمل عــليه حدود أربعة حدّه الأوّل وهو القبليّ ينتهي إلى لا سڤل وعلو الپاپى وهو اليحرى
إلى الدروة الّتــي بــيــن سلوك بن وبين بن حــاصل من هده العرصه وپپن
المجيزة للـكفل الملــك لحــ هدا الحد پپپهى
هذا المنزل پحول پهــ ــپ وإلى عرة فاشترت سيب
الدّار بنت علي بن محمّد من نهــار بهار بن سليمــن و بن عليّ و ابنت وحبّ الدّرّ ابنت أحمد بن نوح لنفسها بمــالها جميع ما وقع عــليه هــذا
البيع المذكور في هذا الكتاب ڤد على معرفة منهم لما وقع عليه
البيع المذكور في هذا الكتاب وعرفت المــشترية والدى باعه بهار بهار پن سلپمن من حمپع هدا المپرل المدكور عسره
ونصف سهم من أربعة وعشرين سهما شائعــة غير مقسومة والّذي قبض من الثّمن دنانير والّذي باعه بــن علي من جميع هذا المنزل الثّمن ثلثة أسهم
من أربعة وعشرين سهما شائعة غير مقسومة والّذي قبض من الــثّمن دينــر واحد والّذي باعته ابنت خمسة أسهم وربع سهم من أربعة وعشرين سهما شائعة غير مقسومة من جميع المنزل
المذكور والّذي قبضت من الثّمن نصف ودپاپپرربع وثمن دينر والّذي باعته حب الدّر ابنت أحمد بن نوح من جميع المنزل المذكور خمسة أسهم وربع سهم من أربعة وعشرين سهما
شائعة غير مقسومة والّذي قبضت من الثّمن نصــف وربــع وثمن دينار فما أدرك سيب الدّار ابنت عــليّ بن محمّد في هذا البيع المذكور في هذا الكتاب من درك من أحد
من احد من النّاس كلّهم فعلى هاولى النّاس المسمّين في هذا الكتاب تسلّم تسليم جميع الثّمــن الّذي المقبوض يجب الپــهم عليهم پسپپ في هدا ذلك الپپع من المدكور حقّ ڤى ويلزمهم هدا الكپاپ حپى پحلصوا
لپ على ما يوجبه الحق والحكم من رد ثمن بــه وقيمة وقليل وكثير ولم يبق لهاولى الــبائعين المسمّيــن في جميع هذا المنزل الّذي وقع عليه هذا البيع
لا يد ولا ملك ولا مورث ولا شركة ولا عڤله علقة ثمن ولا استثنى ولا قليل ولا كثير ولا قــول ولا يمين ولا حجّة شهد على إقرار البائعين المسمّين
في هذا الكتاب بــالـبيــع وقبض الثّمن المذكــور فيه وعلى المشترية بالتّسليم والـحــوز بعد أن قرئ عليهم فأقرّوا بفهمه ومعرفته حرفا
حرفا في صحّة عــقولهم وأبدانهم وجواز أمورهم طائعــين غير مكرهين ولا مجبرين أربع مائة

bi smi ăl lāhi ăr raḥmāni ăr raḥīmi
hāḏā mā ĭštarat saybu ăd dāri ĭbnatu ʿaliyyi bni muḥammad:in ********* min bahāra nahāra bni sulaymāna wa *** bni ʿaliyy:in wa *** ĭbnati *** wa ḥabbi ăd durri ĭbnati ʾaḥmada bni nūḥ:in ***
ĭštarat min hum ʾaǧmaʿīna ǧamīʿa ăl manzili *** ***r ăl maʿrūf bi ʿīsà bni munḫula wa yuḥīṭu bi hāḏā ăl manzili
wa yaštamilu ʿalay hi ḥudūd:un ʾarbaʿaẗ:un ḥaddu hu ăl ʾawwalu wa huwa ăl qibliyyu yantahī ʾilà *** lā sufl:un wa ʿalw:uni ăṯ ṯānī wa huwa ăl baḥriyyu yantahī
ʾilà ăd dirwaẗi ăllatī bayna salūka bni *** wa bayna *** bni *** *** ḥāṣil min hāḏihi ăl ʿarṣaẗi wa bayna ***
ăl mǧyzẗ li l kfl ăl milku li ḥ*** *** hāḏā ăl ḥaddu yantahī ʿalwu hu min fawqi
hāḏā ăl manzili Bḥwl Bh*** *** ***B wa ʾilà ʿrẗ fa ĭštarat saybu
ăd dāri bintu ʿaliyyi bni muḥammad:in min bahāra nahāra bni sulaymāna wa *** bni ʿaliyy:in wa *** ĭbnati *** wa ḥabbi ăd durri ĭbnati ʾaḥmada bni nūḥ:in li nafsi hā bi māli hā ǧamīʿa mā waqaʿa ʿalay hi hāḏā
ăl bayʿu ăl maḏkūru fī hāḏā ăl kitābi Fd*** **** ʿalà maʿrifaẗ:in min hum li mā waqaʿa ʿalay hi
ăl bayʿu ăl maḏkūru fī hāḏā ăl kitābi wa ʿarafati ăl muštariyaẗu *** wa ăllaḏī bāʿa hu bahāru nahāru bnu sulaymāna min ǧamīʿi hāḏā ăl manzili ăl maḏkūri ʿašaraẗu ʾashum:in
wa niṣfu sahm:in min ʾarbaʿaẗ:in wa ʿišrīna sahm:an šāʾiʿaẗ:in ġayri maqsūmaẗ:in wa ăllaḏī qabaḍa min ăṯ ṯamani *** danānīra wa ăllaḏī bāʿa hu *** bnu ʿaliyyi min ǧamīʿi hāḏā ăl manzili ăṯ ṯamanu ṯalāṯaẗu ʾashum:in
min ʾarbaʿaẗ:in wa ʿišrīna sahm:an šāʾiʿaẗ:in ġayri maqsūmaẗ:in wa ăllaḏī qabaḍa min ăṯ ṯamani dīnār:un wāḥid:un wa ăllaḏī bāʿat hu *** ĭbnatu *** ḫamsaẗu ʾashum:in wa rubʿu sahm:in min ʾarbaʿaẗ:in wa ʿišrīna sahm:an šāʾiʿaẗ:in ġayri maqsūmaẗ:in min ǧamīʿi ăl manzili
ăl maḏkūri wa ăllaḏī qabaḍat mina ăṯ ṯamani niṣfu wa rubʿu wa ṯumnu dīnār:in wa ăllaḏī bāʿat hu ḥabbu ăd durri ĭbnatu ʾaḥmada bni nūḥ:in min ǧamīʿi ăl manzili ăl maḏkūri ḫamsaẗu ʾashum:in wa rubʿu sahm:in min ʾarbaʿaẗ:in wa ʿišrīna sahm:an
šāʾiʿaẗ:in ġayri maqsūmaẗ:in wa ăllaḏī qabaḍat mina ăṯ ṯamani niṣfu wa rubʿu wa ṯumnu dīnār:in fa mā ʾadraka sayba ăd dāri ĭbnata ʿaliyyi bni muḥammad:in fī hāḏā ăl bayʿi ăl maḏkūri fī hāḏā ăl kitābi min darak:in min ʾaḥad:in
mina ăn nāsi kulli him fa ʿalà hāʾulàʾi ăn nāsi ăl musammayna fī hāḏā ăl kitābi tasallumu taslīmu ǧamīʿi ăṯ ṯamani ăllaḏī ăl maqbūḍi yaǧibu ø ʿalay ø him ø fī ø ḏālika ø min ø ḥaqq:in ø wa ʾilay yalzamu him hum bi sababi hāḏā ăl bayʿi ăl maḏkūri fī hāḏā ăl kitābi ḥattà yuḫalliṣū
*** lB ʿalà mā yūǧibu hu ăl ḥaqqu wa ăl ḥukmu min raddi ṯaman:in bi wa hi qīmaẗ:in wa qalīl:in wa kaṯīr:in wa lam yabqa li hāʾulàʾi ăl bāʾiʿīna ăl musammayna fī ǧamīʿi hāḏā ăl manzili ăllaḏī waqaʿa ʿalay hi hāḏā ăl bayʿu
lā yad:un wa lā milk:un wa lā mawraṯ:un wa lā širkaẗ:un wa lā ʿulqaẗu ṯaman:in wa lā ĭstiṯn:an wa lā qalīl:un wa lā kaṯīr:un wa lā qawl:un wa lā yamīn:un wa lā ḥuǧǧaẗ:un šahida ʿalà ʾiqrāri ăl bāʾiʿīna ăl musammayna
fī hāḏā ăl kitābi bi ăl bayʿi wa qabḍi ăṯ ṯamani ăl maḏkūri fī hi wa ʿalà ăl muštariyaẗi bi ăt taslīmi wa ăl ḥawzi baʿda ʾan quriʾa ʿalay him fa ʾaqarrū bi fahmi hi wa maʿrifati hi ḥarf:an
ḥarf:an fī ṣiḥḥaẗi ʿuqūli him wa ʾabdāni him wa ǧawāzi ʾumūri him ṭāʾiʿīna ġayra mukrahīna wa lā muǧbarīna *** ʾarbaʿi miʾaẗ:in

In the name of God, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
This is what Saib ad-Dâr, d[aughter of ʿAlî b. Muḥammad, has bought from Nahâr b. Sulaimân and So and So, son of ʿAlî, and So and So, daughter of So and So, and Ḥabb] ad-Durr, daughter of Aḥmad [b. Nûḥ ...................]
she has bought from them al[l] the whole dwelling house [..................] known as (the property of) ʿÎsâ b. Munḫul. [Now] four [boundar]ies enclose
and surround this dwelling [house: its first boundary, viz. the southern, extends to ..................] below and above; the se[co]nd, viz. the northern, exten[ds]
to the dividing wall w[hic]h (is) bet[ween] Salûk b. [So and So ...... the re]maining (portion) of this open area and between [the one (?)]
....................................................., the possession (?) for Ḥ[.................] of this boundary, the upper part of which extends from the top
of this dwelling house ............ [........................] and to .................. Thus Saib
ad-Dâr, daughter of ʿAlî b. Muḥammad, has bought from Nahâr b. Sulaimâ[n and So and So, son of ʿAlî, and So and So, daughter of So and So, and Ḩabb ad-Durr, daughter of Aḥmad b. Nûḥ, for herself from her] own money all that in regard to which
this sale mentioned in this deed was effected ... [........................] according to their being [aware of that about which]
the sale mentioned in this deed [was effected], and the bu[yer] has taken cognizance [of ......................... and that which Nahâr b. Sulaimân has sold of the who]le of this (above) mentioned dwelling house (are) ten shares
and the half of a share of twenty four shares, shared in comm[on, undivided, and that which he has received of the price (amounts to) x dînârs; and that which So and So, s]on of ʿAlî, [has sold] of the whole of this dwelling house (are) three shares [o]f
twenty four shares, shared in common, undivided, [and that which he has received of the] price (amounts to) one (?) dînâ[r; and that which So and So, daughter of So and So has sold, are five shares and the quarter of a share of] twenty [four] shares, shared in common, undivided of the whole (above) mentioned dwelling house
and that which she has received of the price (amounts to) a half and a quarter and an eighth of a d[înâr]; and that which Ḥabb ad-Durr, daughter of Aḥmad b. Nûḥ has sold [of the whole] (above) mentioned [dwelling house] (are) five shares and a quarter of a share of twenty four shares,
shared in common, undivided, and that which she has received of the price (amounts to) a hal[f and a quar]ter and an eighth of a dînâr. But should any evil consequence (vindicatio) ensue to Saib ad-Dâr, daughter of ʿA[lî b. Muḥammad respecting] this sale mentioned in this deed from any
person whatever, it is incumbent upon these persons named in this deed to hand over the whole of the [received] pri[ce to] them because of this sale mentioned in this deed, so that they indemnify
[...............] ... according to what equity and the prescription (of the Holy Law) make obligatory concerning the return of the price [......] both little and much; and there has not remained in favour of these [named sellers] in respect to the whole of this dwelling house, about which this [sale] was effected,
[any] right of possession, any property right, any right of succession, any common ownership, any dispute about the price, any reservation, whether little or much, any sta[tement or oath] or proof for evidence. There have testified to the acknowledgment by the sellers named
in this deed respecting [the sa]le and the receipt of the price mentioned herein, and by the buyer respecting the taking over and the taking posse[ssion after, (it) had been] read to them, so that they have acknowledged that they have understood and comprehended it word
[by word], they being in a state of sound mi[nd] and body and capable of transacting their business, voluntari[ly, without compulsion and not against their will in ......... of the year] four hundred [..............].
